titleInfo.title: Homotopy type of the complex of free factors of a free group

mods.abstract: We show that the complex of free factors of a free group of rank ùî´‚©æ2 is homotopy equivalent to a wedge of spheres of dimension ùî´‚àí2. We also prove that for ùî´‚©æ2, the complement of (unreduced) Outer space in the free splitting complex is homotopy equivalent to the complex of free factor systems and moreover is (ùî´‚àí2)‚Äêconnected. In addition, we show that for every non‚Äêtrivial free factor system of a free group, the corresponding relative free splitting complex is contractible.
